item.title: Flags stolen from veterans memorial in Newberry
item.description: Authorities are searching for those responsible after several flags were apparently stolen from a newly constructed veterans memorial in Newberry

item.title: Tampa Police rescue man from burning house
item.description: Tampa Police rescue man from burning house

item.title: Roadwork at Anna Maria Island Bridge may cause delays.
item.description: Roadwork at Anna Maria Island Bridge may cause delays.

item.title: Memorial rises at the site of a deadly crash in Parrish
item.description: Two 19-year-old men were killed; two others were injured.

item.title: Expert says hurricane readiness includes financial preparedness
item.description: One analyst has some suggestions to be financially prepared for storms.

item.title: Typical summertime weather settles in
item.description: The focus for storm development will remain on the coast on Tuesday.

item.title: ‘All indications are’ body found in pond is missing 18-year-old, Manatee sheriff’s office says
item.description: Investigators have preliminarily identified the body as missing Giovanni Pelletier.

item.title: Trio gets felony charges for the illegal harvesting of Palmetto Berries in Charlotte County
item.description: Regulations were passed in July 2024 to protect the berry against overharvesting and poaching.

item.title: It’s down to two candidates for the next superintendent of Manatee County Schools
item.description: Breslin and Mathis will now advance to one-on-one interviews with school board members.

item.title: National Vinyl Record Day
item.description: We’re going old school with Salty Dog Records for National Vinyl Record Day!

item.title: Emma Thrift entering first year as Lady Sailors head volleyball coach
item.description: Thrift is only 23 years old and this is her first time being a head coach on the high school level.

item.title: 11 a.m. update: Erin to continue heading mostly west for the next day or two
item.description: Winds are estimated at around 40 mph, though that might be slightly high.

item.title: Bradenton man shoots brother after he stabbed girlfriend, deputies say
item.description: The motive for the incident is not yet known, the news release said.
